https://tmrev.io/movie/490601-Bangsal 13 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/ynLXzMNAmHqLfmVNckgXVD5avJu.jpg Nat and Mina stay overnight in a hospital when they accompany the person who is run over by their car. Dr. Aziz places them in Ward 13, a long-closed ward that contains many mysteries. At midnight, Nat hears a knocking sound on the bathroom floor, and she tells her boyfriend, Devon, about it. The next day, Devon comes to the hospital and makes a joke by knocking on the door from the inside, something that is forbidden. Devon dies and the ghost of the crawling nurse, drags Nat into the bathroom gutter. Bangsal 13
